name: RunMan: Race Around the World
summary: Run through 35+ levels across 6 unique and preposterous zones, complete ridiculous feats of speed to earn shiny medals, unlock 4 lovable secret characters and probably some other stuff in this totally awesome platform game.
info:
• 别名: RunMan: Race Around the World
  • 平台: Windows
  • 游戏类型: arcade,adventure,platformer
  • 发行日期: 2009
  • 售价: Free
  • 官方网站: http://whatareyouwait.info/
  • 开发者: TOM SENNETT and MATT THORSON
